nodes.text: Glorious was a Belarus-class medium cruiser of the New Republic Defense Fleet.

During New Republic Intelligence's operation to secure the Teljkon Vagabond, Glorious served as Colonel Pakkpekatt's command ship. Other command staff included, Fleet Office liaison Captain Garch intelligence officer Ixidro Legorburu, then-Lieutenant Ijix Harona, Doctor Archimar, and petty officers Jiod, Marty, Taisden, Sparks and Pleck.
